target.rawSql:
SELECT round_number, start_time, end_time, CONCAT('Training round: ', round_number) as annotation_text
FROM rounds
WHERE job_id = $jobid 
  AND stage = 'FIT'
  AND round_number in ($round_n)
  AND $show_stages = true
ORDER BY round_number, start_time;

SELECT round_number, start_time, end_time, CONCAT('Evaluation round: ', round_number) as annotation_text
FROM rounds
WHERE job_id = $jobid 
  AND stage = 'EVAL'
  AND round_number in ($round_n)
  AND $show_stages = true
ORDER BY round_number, start_time;

targets.rawSql:
WITH time_bounds AS (
    SELECT MIN(start_time) as start_time, MAX(end_time) as end_time
    FROM rounds
    WHERE job_id = ${jobid}
      AND round_number in ($round_n)
)
SELECT time, 
    gpu_util, 
    cpu_util, 
    power_consumption,
    mem_util,
    n_bytes_rcvd,
    n_bytes_sent,
    net_usage_in,
    net_usage_out,
    concat('Client ', cast(client_number as text), ' (', devices.device_name,')')
FROM clients as clients
  JOIN device_measurements USING(client_id)
  JOIN jobs USING(job_id)
  JOIN devices USING(device_id)
WHERE job_id = ${jobid}
  AND client_number in ($clientid)
  -- AND time >= (SELECT start_time FROM time_bounds)
  -- AND time <= (SELECT end_time FROM time_bounds)
ORDER BY time ASC;

SELECT
  device_name,
  AVG(gpu_util) as avg_value
FROM
  clients as clients
  JOIN device_measurements USING (client_id)
  JOIN jobs USING (job_id)
  JOIN devices USING(device_id)
WHERE
  job_id = ${jobid}
  AND client_number in ($clientid)
  AND time >= start_time
GROUP BY
  device_name
ORDER BY
  device_name

SELECT
  device_name,
  AVG(cpu_util) as avg_value
FROM
  clients as clients
  JOIN device_measurements USING (client_id)
  JOIN jobs USING (job_id)
  JOIN devices USING(device_id)
WHERE
  job_id = ${jobid}
  AND client_number in ($clientid)
  AND time >= start_time
GROUP BY
  device_name
ORDER BY
  device_name

SELECT
  device_name,
  AVG(power_consumption) as avg_value
FROM
  clients as clients
  JOIN device_measurements USING (client_id)
  JOIN jobs USING (job_id)
  JOIN devices USING(device_id)
WHERE
  job_id = ${jobid}
  AND client_number in ($clientid)
  AND time >= start_time
GROUP BY
  device_name
ORDER BY
  device_name

SELECT
  device_name,
  AVG(CASE WHEN net_usage_in > 1024*1024 THEN net_usage_in ELSE NULL END) as "Rcv",
  AVG(CASE WHEN net_usage_out > 1024*1024 THEN net_usage_out ELSE NULL END) as "Sent"
FROM
  clients as clients
  JOIN device_measurements USING (client_id)
  JOIN jobs USING (job_id)
  JOIN devices USING(device_id)
WHERE
  job_id = ${jobid}
  AND client_number in ($clientid)
  AND time >= start_time
GROUP BY
  device_name
ORDER BY
  device_name

SELECT
  device_name,
  AVG(n_bytes_rcvd) as "Rcv",
  AVG(n_bytes_sent) as "Sent"
FROM
  clients as clients
  JOIN device_measurements USING (client_id)
  JOIN jobs USING (job_id)
  JOIN devices USING(device_id)
WHERE
  job_id = ${jobid}
  AND client_number in ($clientid)
  AND time >= start_time
GROUP BY
  device_name
ORDER BY
  device_name

SELECT
  device_name,
  AVG(mem_util) as "memory"
FROM
  clients as clients
  JOIN device_measurements USING (client_id)
  JOIN jobs USING (job_id)
  JOIN devices USING(device_id)
WHERE
  job_id = ${jobid}
  AND client_number in ($clientid)
  AND time >= start_time
GROUP BY
  device_name
ORDER BY
  device_name

list.definition:
SELECT project_name
FROM projects p
WHERE EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM jobs j
    WHERE j.project_id = p.project_id
);
list.label: Project
list.name: project
list.query:
SELECT project_name
FROM projects p
WHERE EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM jobs j
    WHERE j.project_id = p.project_id
);

list.definition:
SELECT job_id 
FROM jobs
JOIN projects USING(project_id)
WHERE  (${show_incomplete_jobs} OR (end_time IS NOT NULL))
AND project_name = 'unnamed';
list.label: JobID
list.name: jobid
list.query:
SELECT job_id 
FROM jobs
JOIN projects USING(project_id)
WHERE  (${show_incomplete_jobs} OR (end_time IS NOT NULL))
AND project_name = 'unnamed';

list.label: Rounds
list.name: round_n

list.definition: select client_number from fl_testbed_logging.clients where job_id = ${jobid}
list.label: ClientID
list.name: clientid
list.query: select client_number from fl_testbed_logging.clients where job_id = ${jobid}

list.description: Show incomplete jobs in the job list

list.name: show_incomplete_jobs
